name: Account Log
Account Verification
= 0 : Success
= 1 : Unknown User
func:
msg.payload = "Username Doesn't exist!!!"
return msg;

name: = 2 : Wrong Password
func:
msg.payload = "Invalid Password";
return msg;

name: = 4 : System In Use
func:
msg.payload = "System is used by other user.";
return msg;
